virtual void FT::TICRestart::replay ( Net::GlobalId  gid,
Net::GlobalId  gid2restart,
Core::ContextId  cid2restart,
Net::GlobalId  gid_oldvictim,
Util::Pointer  stolenclo 
) [virtual]

Tell to the process gid to replay a specific context cid from gid

Parameters:
gid [in] the global identifier where to send the signal
gid2restart [in] the global identifier to restart which has cid2restart
cid2restart [in] the context identifier of the context to restart
gid_oldvictim [in] the restarted gid (old victim)
stolenclo [in] the pointer to the theft closure that should be reset to INIT if cid is not found
